title: Gloria's Forever
description: Now happily married, Gloria Long and Jaime Zander have it all...two thriving careers, twins on their way, and off the charts sex. The perfect power couple.But when the unexpected happens, Gloria must face the biggest challenge of her life--a life and death decision that will effect her empire, her babies, and the man she's vowed never to leave.Filled with steamy romance and dramatic twists and turns, this novella-length follow-up to the Gloria series will keep readers on the edge of their seats.
author: Nelle L'Amour
